text:
Atalanta Bergamasca Calcio, often called Atalanta (nicknamed "La Dea", the "Nerazzuri", or the "Orobici") is a football club based in Bergamo, Lombardy, Italy. The club plays in Serie A, as they were promoted from Serie B in 2010–11. They finished 3rd in the 2018–19 Serie A season, meaning they could play in the UEFA Champions League for the first time in the club's history. They play at the Gewiss Stadium, which has a capacity of 21,300. They have a long-standing rivalry with nearby club Brescia.
Retired numbers.
12 – Dedication to fans, the 12th man
14 – Federico Pisani, Forward (1991–97) – "posthumous honour."
80 – Elio Corbani, radio journalist.
